name: MAW
description:
MAW is a simple horror game that represents a unique take on the idea of a "Top-Down Shooter". As a plumbing engineer employed by the government, you are tasked with descending into the Municipality's Abandoned Waterworks facility to investigate a potential structural issue in its bowels.

Armed only with a torch, the game has you navigate through procedurally generated levels in search of hatches to take you deeper into the facility. But it soon becomes clear that you are not as alone as you feel.

Notes:

W A S and D move the character.

Space will let you interact with ladders to return to the menu and leave the game.

Space (Hold) will focus your torch light, which burns enemies.

Space (Hold) will open hatches when next to them.

MAW is an early prototype created by Erik Prinz in the space of 2 weeks.
